import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../Style Folder/CheckoutPage.css";// Add custom styles for the page
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CheckoutPage=()=>{const paymentMethods=[{id:1,name:"PayPal",image:"https://www.paypalobjects.com/webstatic/icon/pp258.png",link:"https://www.paypal.com/"},{id:2,name:"Credit/Debit Card",image:"https://www.livemint.com/lm-img/img/2024/10/18/600x338/2-0-117167611-credit-cards-1-0_1681880187837_1729249625448.jpg",link:"https://www.visa.com/"},{id:3,name:"Google Pay",image:"https://thedailyguardian.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/gpay.jpg",link:"https://pay.google.com/"},{id:4,name:"Apple Pay",image:"https://download.logo.wine/logo/Apple_Pay/Apple_Pay-Logo.wine.png",link:"https://www.apple.com/apple-pay/"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkout-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Checkout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Select your preferred payment method:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"payment-methods",children:paymentMethods.map(method=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"payment-method",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:method.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:method.image,alt:method.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:method.name})]})},method.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/shopingcardpage",className:"btn btn-secondary",children:"Back to Shoping Card"})]});};export default CheckoutPage;
